newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israel, PLO negotiators begin peace talks.
newsitem.headline: Israel, PLO negotiators begin peace talks.

text.p: Palestinian and Israeli officials overseeing implementation of PLO-Israel peace deals began meeting on Monday for the first time since Israeli elections last May, witnesses said.
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Palestinian President Yasser Arafat decided to restart the stalled talks during their first meeting last week.
